## SmithyIntegration.bindToSpecMethod() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

If applicable for the SmithyIntegration type, grants the provided API method permissions to use the integration

**Signature:**

```typescript
abstract bindToSpecMethod(method: ISpecMethod): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  method | [ISpecMethod](./smithy-cdk.ispecmethod) | REST API path |

**Returns:**

void
